suppress.notes: Suppressing as it's a false positive (see: https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258)
Additional Log Injection in Spring Framework
Unauthorized Access with Spring Security Method Security
Changing SecurityContext More Than Once in Single Request Can Fail to Save
Doesn't apply to this project. Reference: https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/reference/html/integration.html#remoting-httpinvoker
This project doesn't use BCrypt / BCryptPasswordEncoder class https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-22976 https://tanzu.vmware.com/security/cve-2022-22976
